alert.note: Alert for Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 12:28AM EST until February 23 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional sleet accumulations of around one half of an inch and ice accumulations of around one quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Somerset, Southeast Aroostook, Northern Piscataquis and Northern Penobscot Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST early this morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Damage to trees and power lines is possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Southeast Aroostook
